divs: Sighting DetailsI Was stargazing like i always do, then the Bright light appears out of no where. and moves in a steady forward motion for about on minute then disappears. It was not a plane, it wasnt flashing, it wasnt making a sound, it was just there, i stared at it the whole time. Then it vanished. I Havent seen it since.
Summary: It shot across the sky, and i live close to an airport so i see plenty of planes, and i know for a fact, that This. Was. Not. A. Plane
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Casper
There were no other sightings in Casper on or around August 31st 2011
